newsitem.title: USA: ICG unit in offer for 11-5/8 pct notes.
newsitem.headline: ICG unit in offer for 11-5/8 pct notes.

text.p: ICG Communications Inc said on Monday that its ICG Holdings Inc subsidiary began an offer to exchange its $176 million principal amount at maturity of 11-5/8 percent senior discount notes due 2007 and $100 million of exchangeable preferred stock for an equal principal amount of senior discount notes and exchangeable preferred stock that have been registered with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
Both securities originally were issued in a private placement on March 11. The exchange offer expires July 15.
ICG provides various communications and telecommunications services. Its shares fell 1-9/16 to 18-1/4 in Nasdaq trading on Monday.
